history.proof: intros net Hrefined. apply (lift_prop candidate_term_gt_log). intros net' Hdeghost. apply (lower_prop candidate_term_gt_log). intros net'' Hrefined'. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: simulation_1, candidate_term_gt_log_invariant. - scongruence depth: 3use: simulation_1, candidate_term_gt_log_invariant. - scongruence depth: 3use: simulation_1, candidate_term_gt_log_invariant.

exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface ctgli : candidate_term_gt_log_interface net : network Hrefined : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net The term "ctgli" has type "candidate_term_gt_log_interface" while it is expected to have type "network".

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface ctgli : candidate_term_gt_log_interface net : network Hrefined : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net net' : network Hdeghost : raft_intermediate_reachable net' net'' : network Hrefined' : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net'' Unable to unify "raft_intermediate_reachable net'" with "candidate_term_gt_log (deghost net'')".

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface ctgli : candidate_term_gt_log_interface net : network Hrefined : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net net' : network Hdeghost : raft_intermediate_reachable net' net'' : network Hrefined' : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net'' Unable to unify "raft_intermediate_reachable (deghost net'')" with "candidate_term_gt_log (deghost net'')".

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface ctgli : candidate_term_gt_log_interface net : network Hrefined : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net net' : network Hdeghost : raft_intermediate_reachable net' net'' : network Hrefined' : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net'' Unable to unify "refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net" with "candidate_term_gt_log (deghost net'')".

original: intros net Hrefined. apply (candidate_term_gt_log_invariant ctgli). apply (lift_prop candidate_term_gt_log). intros net' Hdeghost. apply (lower_prop candidate_term_gt_log). intros net'' Hrefined'. apply Hdeghost. apply (simulation_1 net''). apply Hrefined.
